content: आसक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Strongly attached to, intent on, devoted or addicted to, (usually with <ab>loc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); द्यूत°, मृगया°. {@--2@} Absorbed or engaged in, zealously following or pursuing. {@--3@} Fixed on, directed towards, joined or attached to, placed or resting on; मन्मुखासक्तदृष्टिः <ls>K. 158</ls>; यदासक्तं सख्यं जने <ls>Mv. 5. 58</ls> formed; शिखरासक्तमेघाः <ls>Ku. 6. 40</ls> resting on; °बाहुलतया <ls n="Ku.">8.</ls> {@--4@} Surrounded, encircled. {@--5@} Continuous, perpetual, eternal. {@--6@} Trusting to, confiding in. --क्तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Eternally, perpetually.
